title: Royal Park FOUR Bedroom Apartment For Immediate Sale.
details:
Fully Furnished Luxury 04 Bedroom Apartment For Immediate Sale At The Royal Park Rajagiriya.

Master Bedroom With Attached Bathroom & 03 Bedrooms with two common Toilets.

Large Living And Dining Area.

Kitchen With 4 Burner Hub.

Separate Maids Room & Bathroom.

All Bed Rooms Including Living & Dining Have Air Condition.

Facilities Such As:

24 hour security, Cargills Super Market, Restaurant, Hair Saloon,

Swimming Pool, Gym, Tennis Court & Children's Play ground area.

For Viewing And Other Further Information Of The Apartment, Please Do Not Hesitate In Contacting Us

Web Site: www.menavid.com
